creditline: Given in memory of Henry Dutton Thrall
description: embroidery on silk; obverse: roosters in the fall rice harvest; reverse: monkeys in the cherry blossoms and the young monkeys beside the stream with crab and rushes; all heavily and beautifully embroidered lifelike; the title of old favorite fable Saru Kani Gakksen; in the style of Sosen
title: Four-panel folding screen
